short_summary: Information Technology Staff Augmentation and Project Delivery Services
description: The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation is seeking to establish additional Supply Arrangements for the provision of IT Staff Augmentation and Project Delivery Services. The contract will be for 1 year, commencing on 2022-12-15 and ending on 2023-12-14. The RFSA is the last and final annual qualification opportunity.
duration_in_months: .TEXT REQUIRED TO BE ADDED BASED ON CONTRACT DURATION)
full_summary:
**Title**
===============

CDIC RFSA 2020-2842 – 2022 Refresh  
SADC DAMA 2020-2842 – MISE À JOUR 2022

**Tender Information**
-------------------

*   **Reference Number**: PW-22-01016860
*   **Amendment Number**: 1
*   **Publication Date**: 12 December 2022
*   **Tender Closing Date**: 26 January 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   **Amendment Date**: 12 January 2023

**Supply Arrangement Information**
---------------------------------

*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: To be determined
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: To be determined
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Supply Arrangement
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
*   **Regions of Opportunity**: Canada
*   **Regions of Delivery**: World

**Service Description**
---------------------

The Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation (CDIC) is seeking to establish additional Supply Arrangements during this last and final annual qualification opportunity (2022 Refresh) for the provision of:

*   **IT Staff Augmentation Services**: To provide IT staff augmentation services to meet CDIC’s IT needs on an as-and-when-required basis.
*   **Project Delivery Services**: To provide project delivery services to support CDIC’s project management needs on an as-and-when-required basis.

**Contracting Entity Information**
--------------------------------

*   **Contracting Entity Name**: Canada Deposit Insurance Corporation
*   **Contracting Entity Address**: 50 O'Connor Street, Ottawa, Ontario K1P 6L2, Canada

**Contact Information**
----------------------

*   **Contact Name**: Judy Ann Hollander
*   **Contact Email**: [Jhollander@cdic.ca](mailto:Jhollander@cdic.ca)
*   **Contact Phone**: (343) 576-2218
